name: Dead Moan
description:
You are one of the last humans on Earth, sent with your ally to an island infested with zombies. You mission : make it a haven of peace. Will you manage to survive long enough to see this dream come true?

With all kind of weapons, you may be able to survive 5 minutes more in this immersive and ultra dynamic zombie FPS!

TONS OF FEATURES

★ 9 different types of special zombies
★ Explore the island with more than 8 beautiful areas
★ Survive over 30 Campaign missions with Jack, your ally
★ Yes, Zombies have weapons too
★ Reduce them to dust with more than 30 deadly weapons
★ Finish them with powerful explosives
★ Equip yourself with ultra-powerful weapons: HMG, Rocket Launcher, Minigun...
★ Get closer with brutal weapons like the chainsaw
★ Use your gadgets like laser, mines, grenades and many more
★ Improve 6 bonus skills like stamina, cash magnet or slow motion
★ Daily tournaments to challenge the world and earn rewards
★ Save your progress on the Cloud
